arts.ttl: Wrexham maintain strong away form with victory at play-off hopefuls Huddersfield
arts.sum: Steven Fletcher got the only goal in West Yorkshire.

arts.ttl: James McClean savages former club and Wrexham's League One rivals for sacking manager
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic sacked manager Shaun Maloney on Sunday following a poor run of form, and Latics old boy James McClean has not held back in his assessment of the situation

arts.ttl: James McClean tears into Wrexham's rivals for sacking manager and brutally mocks statement
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic sacked manager Shaun Maloney on Monday and the decision has prompted a scathing attack from Wrexham's James McClean, who dug out his old club's owner

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds called out over transfer business as Wrexham star's dad left unhappy
arts.sum: Ollie Palmer has not played a single minute of League One football since Wrexham signed Sam Smith and Jay Rodriguez in January, with his father now hitting out at their arrival

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds called out by Wrexham star's dad over £2m-plus spending as son left out again
arts.sum: Wrexham star Ollie Palmer's dad has hit out after his son was left out of Phil Parkinson's squad yet again, questioning the club's outlay on two new strikers in the winter window

arts.ttl: Ryan Reynolds calls on Wrexham fans to 'act now' after shelling out millions
arts.sum: Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney have released a new Wrexham advert, urging supporters to buy kits and joking that running the club is like "lighting money on fire"

arts.ttl: ‘Have to win this’ – Huddersfield Town vs Wrexham prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Huddersfield Town vs Wrexham prediction ahead of the League One clash on Tuesday. The post ‘Have to win this’ – Huddersfield Town vs Wrexham prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Huddersfield Town vs. Wrexham - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's League One clash between Huddersfield Town and Wrexham, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
